categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: A battle occurred on the planet Agamar during the second main offensive of the Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. The battle resulted in a victory for the forces of the Imperial Military.
The battle on Agamar was first mentioned on the official site for the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the Sith Empire's entry in The Holonet section of the site.
